meanings.definition: To examine for the purpose of noting similarities and differences.
meanings.sent1: She compares the two paintings to see which one has more colors.
meanings.sent2: He compares prices at different stores before making a purchase.
meanings.sent3: The cat compares the toy mouse to a real one, trying to decide if it's worth playing with.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work compares to a marathon runner's commitment to training.
meanings.sent5: The teacher compares the student's progress to a growing plant, nurturing and guiding along the way.

meanings.definition: To be worthy of comparison; bear comparison.
meanings.sent1: The new movie compares favorably to the classic films of the past.
meanings.sent2: His skills in basketball compare well with those of professional players.
meanings.sent3: The cake she baked compares so deliciously that it could rival a bakery's best.
meanings.sent4: His bravery in the face of danger compares to that of a legendary hero.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset compares to a painting by a famous artist, capturing hearts with its colors.
